fc64921125bde5d31980ab160b3707c97711a6d730","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://ce20fd78101df626dd950a86434c63449f8b9b993ca98dd4e953006326eaaf0c","dweb:/ipfs/QmdcoxNQE5yaVX4H6Np8xix6sEmZiMJGF3ZR1pnibUB1H8"]},"src/YoyoTypes.sol":{"keccak256":"0x2465f122815f58d6c56827e64ba86768f15229c1dd26c83d427d82969924e9c3","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://0050be008526742ab02fc09eaf36655949482ff3a4089430dbb5f12f53c3be22","dweb:/ipfs/QmW8gRzZDzuAFAXxYLaMSKD9RhM7UkHEqsAo8GZcREJvsN"]}},"version":1}

changeMintPrice(uint256).details: Cannot be called during an open or closed auction

params._newPrice: New basic mint price in wei

checkUpkeep(bytes).details: Called by Chainlink Keepers to determine if performUpkeep should be executed

params.checkData: Encoded data for the upkeep check (not used in this implementation)

returns.performData: Encoded data to be passed to performUpkeep
returns.upkeepNeeded: Boolean indicating if upkeep is needed

claimFailedRefunds().details: Reverts if caller has no failed refunds to claim

claimNftForWinner(uint256).details: Validates that the caller is the auction winner and auction is closed

params._auctionId: ID of the auction to manually finalize
ID of the auction to retrieve

getChainlinkForwarderAddress().details: The Chainlink Forwarder is the authorized Automation contract for upkeeps

returns._0: AuctionStruct Full data of the latest auction

getCurrentAuctionPrice().details: For English auctions: highest bid + minimum incrementFor Dutch auctions: calculated based on elapsed time

returns._0: uint256 Current auction price in wei

getDutchAuctionNumberOfIntervals().details: Returns DUTCH_AUCTION_DROP_NUMBER_OF_INTERVALS constant (48)Price drops occur at regular intervals throughout the auction durationWith 24-hour auctions, this means a price drop every 30 minutes (24h / 48 = 0.5h)

returns._0: uint256 Number of price drop intervals (48)

getDutchAuctionStartPriceMultiplier().details: Starting price = basic mint price * multiplier.Used in `openNewDutchAuction` and `restartAuction` to determine starting price for Dutch auctions.

returns._0: uint256 Dutch auction start price multiplier

getElegibilityForClaimingNft(uint256,add.details: Returns true if the claimer has an unclaimed NFT for the given auction

params._auctionId: The ID of the auction to check eligibility for
params._claimer: The address of the potential claimer

returns._0: bool True if the claimer can claim the NFT, false otherwise

params._bidder: Address of the bidder to check

returns._0: uint256 Amount of failed refunds in wei

getGracePeriod().details: Returns GRACE_PERIOD constant (6 hours = 21600 seconds)After auction end time + grace period, any user can manually close/restart auctionsProvides resilience against Chainlink Automation downtime or failures

returns._0: uint256 Grace period duration in seconds (21600)
uint256 Minimum bid increment in wei

getMinimumBidChangePercentage().details: Returns MINIMUM_BID_INCREMENT_PERCENTAGE constant (25 per-mille = 2.5%)This percentage is applied to the basic mint price to determine s_minimumBidChangeAmount

returns._0: uint256 Minimum bid increment percentage in per-mille (25 = 2.5%)

getMinimumPossibleMintPrice().details: Returns MINIMUM_POSSIBLE_MINT_PRICE constantCalculated as PERCENTAGE_DENOMINATOR / MINIMUM_BID_INCREMENT_PERCENTAGEEnsures mint price is large enough to avoid rounding issues in percentage calculations

returns._0: uint256 Minimum possible mint price in wei (40 wei with current constants)
address Address of the NFT collection contract

getPercentageDenominator().details: Returns PERCENTAGE_DENOMINATOR constant (1000 = 100%)Using 1000 instead of 100 provides better precision for decimal percentagesUsed to calculate minimum bid increments and other percentage-based values

getUpkeepId().details: Used by Chainlink Automation to identify this contract's upkeep registration

onERC721Received(address,address,uint256.details: Whenever an {IERC721} `tokenId` token is transferred to this contract via {IERC721-safeTransferFrom} by `operator` from `from`, this function is called. It must return its Solidity selector to confirm the token transfer. If any other value is returned or the interface is not implemented by the recipient, the transfer will be reverted. The selector can be obtained in Solidity with `IERC721Receiver.onERC721Received.selector`.

params._auctionType: The type of auction (ENGLISH or DUTCH)
params._tokenId: The ID of the NFT to be auctioned

performUpkeep(bytes).details: Closes or restarts auctions based on their state

params.performData: Encoded data containing the auctionId to process

placeBidOnAuction(uint256).details: Validates auction existence and state before processing bid

params._auctionId: ID of the auction to bid on

setNftContract(address).details: Can only be called once by the owner after deployment

params._yoyoNftAddress: The address of the NFT collection smart contract

changeMintPrice(uint256).notice: Allows the owner to change the basic mint price for future auctions

checkUpkeep(bytes).notice: Checks if upkeep is needed for Chainlink Automation

claimFailedRefunds().notice: Allows users to claim ETH from failed refund attempts

claimNftForWinner(uint256).notice: Manual function to claim NFT for auction winner when automatic mint fails

getAuctionCounter().notice: Returns the total number of auctions created so far

getAuctionDuration().notice: Returns the duration of each auction in hours

getAuctionFromAuctionId(uint256).notice: Returns all information about a specific auction by its ID

getChainlinkForwarderAddress().notice: Returns the address of the Chainlink Forwarder

getCurrentAuctionPrice().notice: Returns the current price of the ongoing auction

getDutchAuctionNumberOfIntervals().notice: Returns the number of price drop intervals in Dutch auctions

getDutchAuctionStartPriceMultiplier().notice: Returns the multiplier used to calculate Dutch auction starting price

getElegibilityForClaimingNft(uint256,add.notice: Checks if a claimer is eligible to claim their unminted NFT for a specific auction

getFailedRefundAmount(address).notice: Returns the amount of failed refunds for a specific bidder

getGracePeriod().notice: Returns the grace period duration for manual auction closure

getMinimumBidChangeAmount().notice: Returns the minimum amount required to outbid the current highest bid

getMinimumBidChangePercentage().notice: Returns the percentage used to calculate the minimum bid increment

getMinimumPossibleMintPrice().notice: Returns the minimum allowed mint price for NFTs

getNftContract().notice: Returns the address of the NFT contract managed by this auction

getPercentageDenominator().notice: Returns the denominator used for percentage calculations

getUpkeepId().notice: Returns the upkeep ID associated with this contract

openNewAuction(uint256,uint8).notice: Opens a new auction for a given NFT token

performUpkeep(bytes).notice: Executes the Chainlink Keepers upkeep if conditions are met

placeBidOnAuction(uint256).notice: Allows users to place bids on active auctions

setNftContract(address).notice: Sets the address of the NFT collection smart contract to be managed by the auction
